posts.author: Duplicate bentoylight
posts.post_text: April 23, 2018 at 12:21 PM#2HiCreate a control preset : "lamp On"Thenfixture (what fixture?) at preset Control."lamp On"

posts.author: jblakk
posts.post_text: August 28, 2018 at 5:41 PM#3Create a lamp on/off/reset pallet.Selection at preset 7."lamp on". Wait 10Off preset 7."lamp on"This will lamp on any selected fixtures. Useful in conjunction with layout views.

title: Macro to Lamp On any fixtures
